data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vicente, Filipe, Fontoura, Paulo, Cesari, Michele, Rebecchi, Lorena, Guidetti, Roberto, Serrano, Artur, Bertolani, Roberto (2013): Integrative taxonomy allows the identification of synonymous species and the erection of a new genus of Echiniscidae (Tardigrada, Heterotardigrada). Zootaxa 3613 (6): 557-572, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3613.6.3
